roleset.name: get rid of a king
roleset.note: DETHRONE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'dethrone' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, Framenet entry Change of leadership. (from dethrone.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: Pittsburgh? king?
example.text: Pittsburgh figures it-1 will be dethroned [*-1] but plans to accept its ouster graciously.

example.name: all args
example.text: A peasants revolt dethroned John as king of Lower Slobovia.
